comments.body:
Could you add a note here to make it obvious why there are two separate versions of the typings? Perhaps something like:

``` TypeScript
// Type definitions for mocha 2.2.5 (running on node.js)
```

And in `mocha.d.ts`

``` TypeScript
// Type definitions for mocha 2.2.5 (running in a browser)
```
Making the comment more specific sounds fine, but that kind of convention should be standardized across DefinitelyTyped and therefore self-evident from the file names.
